amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for HUD Management and Administration by $3 million and increases funding for HUD Office of Field Policy and Management by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for HUD Management and Administration by $3 million and to increase funds for HUD Office of Field Policy and Management by $3 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A015) offered by Ms. Castor (FL).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
